description: The BareBone_X509TrustManagerCanNotBypassExt class is an implementation of the X509TrustManager interface that does not properly verify the trust of the SSL/TLS certificates. It is vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks and can be exploited by an attacker to intercept and decrypt the communication between the client and the server.
recommendation: Use a secure and trusted implementation of the X509TrustManager interface, such as the default implementation provided by the Java platform, or a third-party library that properly verifies the trust of the SSL/TLS certificates.
